reviews.review:
Although outside pressure probably had something to do with its release date 
*cough* [strike]before it was done[/strike] *cough* (why not closer to halloween?) 
I appreciate that this game was released when it was to allow the community to shape the balance and tweaks to gameplay and allow time to grind up points for advancement.
I believe this game is a lot of fun for the following reason:

[b]YOU ARE IN A HORROR MOVIE[/b]
Previous games have used the multiplayer aspect to pit monsters versus survivors, but not quite on this level before.
One can be a helpless survivor, scrambling to escape a never-ending nightmare with others they can choose to cooperate with or bait the monster with to save their own hide.
You can be the killer, fast, powerful, and driven with malice to hunt down the other players using cunning and prediction to catch other players off-guard.
You get the feeling from each game a new story is unfolding, that you inevitably are a part of. Especially with items that change light levels and fog in the game.
Couple that with a kind of misty backstory of a web of blood and you have a weird, awesome, near-lovecraftian experience of confusion, heart-racing, and momentary relief from danger that normally only comes from single-player horror games like FNAF or Slenderman multiplayer.

For those considering buying the game, do it now, as you will need to grind up points for additional perks that make the game more enjoyable. And hey, its $20, not like other high-graphic $40 games that are multiplayer only.  [u]You can't expect the quality to be the same for what you pay.[/u] Plus, you help influence gameplay changes in its continuing development.

ok, enough preaching.

You might want to hold off buying the game if you want a more finished, bug-free game, as the devs are working still on game-balancing, new content, bug-fixing and the like.  
A recent patch helped to balance infinite escape spots for survivors, so it is easier to play the killer now in a sense (less abuse of arena).   
Perks on certain characters are overpowered versus others, meaning these perks almost never see play.  
The ranking system is different from other games and takes some adjustment, as it is not enough to simply win the match while hiding in a corner watching everyone else work.  [u]Ya gotta be brave to get pips.[/u]
Disconnects ruin the fun (when has it not in multiplayer gaming?).  Perhaps some adjustment to disconnecting so that if a survivor disconnects at very start of match, a generator gets taken off the count or something.  
The connections in games vary by match, meaning some matches are laggier than others, [b]your connection is not going to be stable every game.[/b] Very frustrating when as a survivor you glitch into the view of the killer, or as the killer you can't hit a lagging survivor.

The current state of the game is completely survivor sided. Killers have been getting the short end of the stick with perks and the newest killers have been pretty lack luster. They decided to nerf characters that didn't need nerfing at this point the game is impossible to play as killer. You can hit someone and 10 seconds later they are healed because of boon. If you try to destroy the boon you're wasting time that could be used in applying pressure to the game. Killers no longer have any sort of slow down to the game and the games passive slow down is null with recent survivor perks. A lot of balancing needs to be done in this game. Sad to see a once amazing game be so terrible, as well as being a tyrant in the killer survivor genre of games. One last issue is lighting, my screen would be so dark in some maps I can't see where people are when they are 4 feet away from me. I hope to see a lot of changes to balancing and bugs. This is my official resignation from DBD.

Ja ich weiß, spiele das Spiel überhaupt nicht lange und kann/darf auch eigentlich nichts über das Spiel sagen. Jedoch bin ich so von dem Spiel genervt, dass ich jetzt einfach diese Review schreiben muss.


Also zu aller erst etwas positives:
- Es macht mit Freunden sehr viel Spaß (Auch ohne diverse Items/Add-Ons).
- Es gibt einem ein extremen Nervenkitzel (vorallem wenn Du der letzte Überlebende bist).
- Es ist nicht all zu leicht in dem Spiel aufzusteigen.


Nun die negativen Aspekte:
- Es ist voll mit diversen Bugs (Ja ich weiß, das Spiel ist noch nicht lange auf dem Markt).
- Wenn man mit Freunden gegen ein unbekannten Killer spielt, wird man aus der Gruppe geschmissen.
- Man verliert ab und zu die Verbindung während des Spiels.
- Manche Gimmicks funktionieren nicht (z.B das die Taschenlampe den Killer nicht blendet).
- Während des Spielens gibt es oft sogenannte "ruckler".

Trotz allem ist es ein echt tolles und spaßiges Spiel.

Soy un fan de las películas de miedo y en especial del genero slasher que usualmente utiliza el recurso del asesino serial que acaba con sus victimas, no he jugado aún al Until Dawn pero si puedo decir que este juego emula bastante bien esta experiencia de una película de miedo sobre todo cuando sabes que el asesino es manejado por una persona o por ti, esto abre un abanico de posibilidades increíble y afecta demasiado la experiencia. El juego esta terminado pero aún tiene mucho para dar y es algo bueno porque los desarrolladores continúan agregando parches para corregir bugs y mejorar aún mas la experiencia.

A FAVOR:
* El juego tiene personajes diferentes con habilidades diferentes estas habilidades comienzan a tomar forma a medida que subes de nivel
* Gráficos y ambientación espeluznante realmente quieres salir de ahí o si eres el asesino saca tus instintos destructivos
* Los perks son bastante creativos y no te convierten en un ser invencible, digamos un personaje de bajo nivel puede escaparse de un asesino en niveles altos o viceversa
* El juego funciona bien en pc's de gama media
* Posibilidad de jugar con amigos creando partidas privadas
* El sistema de rango hace que las partidas no sean repetitivas 
* Diseño de estrategias para ganar partidas que no necesariamente te obligan o hacen que dependas de las otras personas
* Los mapas se generan de forma aleatoria lo que hace que no puedas memorizarlos para tener una ventaja, cada partida es una experiencia un poco diferente
* Tutoriales muy sencillos que te hacen entender la lógica del juego muy rápidamente.
* Elementos sorpresa como baúles, el uso de casillas, factor niebla que pueden ayudarte o afectarte en cada partida.

EN CONTRA
* Aún tiene algunos bugs, gráficos y de jugabilidad, personajes que quedan flotando o aun después de haber escapado los colocas como si hubiesen muerto
* La historia así como los factores que hacen diferentes a cada personaje no es clara dentro del juego se debe investigar por fuera para saber quien es cada uno y por que están ahí
* Poca cantidad de mapas aunque tienen la extensión adecuada después de un tiempo te acostumbras y le quita un poco de tensión al juego.

En resumen es un videojuego que vale bastante la pena no es tan costoso y si te generara horas y horas de diversión, si miras vídeos en youtube sobre el juego te vas a encontrar con miles y miles de experiencias diferentes, un recomendado total, espero que este pequeño análisis te sirva, gracias.

Was a very fun game, pretty straight forward, killers kill and survivors survive.
There are a few players using toxic tactics like camping on hanging survivors, but you can find fun games most times.

Enjoy the periodic buff/nerfs of survivors and killers and the unhelpful advice from the community like "just buy the killer and learn what tactics work for and against them" or the advice to use very specific perks that are useless vs other killer, the devs still haven't done much to address hook camping by killers despite it being a thing since I started playing, but I guess it lets them obtain easy points.

Rather than fix game issues the devs will pander to a wider customer base and get licensed characters rather than fix issues long term players raise, enjoy facing off against overpowered killers like the pig (places a reverse bear trap on your head and you take your chances on removing it by going to jigsaw boxes hoping the killer isn't around while it's on a timer that will kill you), the nightmare (you run a timer that causes you to fall asleep, a state that gives Freddy more powers and you have to hope he isn't around the randomly selected alarm clock) and toxic perks and builds at higher levels literally showing where you are to killers who are within certain ranges of you despite being hidden behind objects.

Dead by Daylight - это когда после успешно починенного генератора чувствуешь себя прирожденным инженером
Dead by Daylight - это когда жертвы издеваются над маньяком
Dead by Daylight - это когда изучил карту лучше, чем свой родной двор
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяк аккуратно снял тебя с окна и взял в свои нежные объятия, а ты оказался при смерти
Dead by Daylight - это когда тебя подставляют, а ты злопамятный, но быстро отходчивый, благодаря категории альтруизма
Dead by Daylight - это когда Дуайт Честноеполе рубит фишку, красное одевает
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяк не может выйти за ворота и навешать выжившим, хотя на экране лобби он прекрасно себя чувствует за забором
Dead by Daylight - это когда снимаешь два туловища с крюка после открытия ворот, все трое сбегают, а ты отправляешься к Сущности на свиданку
Dead by Daylight - это когда вламываешься в убежище убийцы, грабишь его сундук и удивляешься, почему же он так зол
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяк принципиально будет вытирать своё орудие, даже при виде безнадежно убегающих жертв
Dead by Daylight - это когда сочувствуешь истории Призрака больше, чем историям 4-ых выживших вместе взятых
И в заключении, Dead by Daylight - это когда НАЙТИ ВЫЙТИ

This game is so much fun, especially when you invite some of your friends. But for some reason my game crashes a lot. And by a lot I mean A LOT. And this only started happening today, I have already crashed 3 times while playing. Why is this happening all of a sudden? I just sat in my couch, I was playing this game and BOOM, my game crashed. I don't know how many others have experienced this, but it's not pleasant. I even lost some of my rank while playing a killer. I went from level 15 to level 16, all because the game crashed. And that ladies and gentlemen, made me a rage like a mad man. I really hope they come across to why this happens. But all and all, this game is fascinating, gameplay, the concept is on point. l love the Halloween update 8)

5 years ago I wrote this review.
It's 2021 and I still play this game. It's a guilty pleasure. It's not good. Still, I feel the need to change this review somewhat. The bugs I complained about back then are no longer in the game.

... but there are new ones. And that's not acceptable.
This game is a poorly balanced buggy mess and it is extremely unkind to new players. Don't play it.

Gênero: Terror, Terror de Sobrevivência, Multijogador, Ação...
Preço (na steam): Versão Padrão: R$ 36,99
Deluxe Edition: R$ 55,99
Silent Hill Edition: R$ 97,59
Notas na steam: Muito positivas

Vamos para a avaliação...

Dead by Daylight é um jogo de terror multiplayer (4vs1), onde um jogador assume o papel do selvagem assassino, e os outros quatro jogadores atuam como sobreviventes, tentando escapar do assassino e evitar serem pegos e mortos.

Minha nota: 9/10 ☆☆☆☆-☆
Mais um jogo subestimado.

This game is really fun to play, however there are bugs which I'm aware at an early stages. Love playing with friends and scaring the shit out of them. So many jump scares and funny moments I've had on this game. Can't wait for the updates to fix this bugs and improve them. 

[u] Bugs & improvements that need fixing, that I've noticed: [/u]
- When you're playing with friends online as a survior it takes so long to find a game or when you find a game it sometimes kicks you out of the lobby.
- Glitches when you're on the hook. When someone got me down, I was stuck behind it and the killer couldn't get me. I crouch over and over and eventually got out and won the game. (Wish I was recording it, best escape ever.)
- Chasing the survior around and around. (Loop issues)
-  Award the players when someone disconnects or when the killer leaves the game when all the generators are done.
- Spawn points with the killer. I'm sick of getting killed straight away due to spawning right next to him.

[u] Should add: [/u]
- Voice Communication in game.
- Connection bar so we know if we're lagging when you press tab or something.  
- When you play online with friends, allow an option to be the killer.
- More maps that are more spooky.
- New killers

- Slendy

(Updated Review)

+ Fun gameplay, interesting concepts with the developers adding different ways to play
+ Developers are working to improve the game for survivors and killers
+ Variety of maps, perks, items, survivors and killers.
- Stills quite a few bugs/issues.
- Updates can take a long time. Certain killers are significantly stronger than other killers.
- Gameplay requires more balance needs to do more to reward survivors for playing well.

While I am finding the game better than before, I would rate the game 8/10 - however this rating changes depending on who you're playing with, as the quality of the game shifts considerably depending on the people you are playing with/against.
Sometimes fun, sometimes not. The matchmaking is mentally disabled, most maps are survivor-favored and it's full of toxic crybabies

The balance is slightly more even nowadays and the devs have started to catch up with the community again, but the toxic side of the playerbase is still alive. The matchmaking still acts up, and the crossplay is making some matches stupidly easy or stupidly hard, depending on what platform each player is using. A console player will cry if they go against a PC Nurse or Huntress, and a PC player will laugh when a console killer is playing. I won't recommend this to anyone who respects themselves, but if you're like me and hate yourself, go right ahead.

Tip, for a "fun" experience, play as a survivor.

บัคเยอะสุดๆ killer ตัว the wraith กดอุ้ม survivor ทียืนค้างกระจาย แถมเวลาเล่นkiller เวลาเล่นไปนานๆ มันจะมีบางรอบ อยู่ดีๆ survivor เข้ามาจากไหนไม่รู้7-8คน จนคอมผมรับไม่ไหว ขึ้นเด้ง บัคไรเนี่ยแหละ เป็นเกมที่บัคเยอะชิพหาย หลุดทีแร้งค์ 9 ไป แร้งค์ 11 ติดบัคทีก็แร้งค์ลดโครตเยอะ

Оптимизация есть, страх есть, особенно когда за тобой мчится маньячина с бензопилой и ты уже начинаешь видеть красный огонек под ногами, шкафы есть, капканы есть, крюки чтоб вешать невинных людишек тоже есть 
Единственное что в игре нет войс чата, а хотелось бы, даже если б маньяк слышал, все равно связь желательно держать с тиммейтами, а в остальном игрушка неплохая, но однообразная и долго не поиграешь, тем более один. 9/10 за отсутствие связи с тимой

原本以为这游戏会死的很快。然而却大大出乎我的预料。
优点：
1.娱乐效果不错，没错，这是一款搞笑游戏而不是一款恐怖游戏。每次当我被挂上去的时候都会联想到亲那个啥妈挂树，在宿舍一堆人一起玩效果更佳。
2.时时刻刻的刺激感。因为你不知道屠夫在哪，只能凭借声音和天赋技能去感知屠夫。（萌新开发动机时总是瑟瑟发抖）
3.新颖的题材。在枪车球沙盒横行的今天，体验一下这种小时候躲猫猫也感觉挺有趣的。
缺点：
1.目前模式单一，内容较少。由于我是b测阶段玩的，玩了7小时就感觉玩腻了吃灰了。所以不知道开发组有没有更新一点干货。个人认为如果不是一堆主播带动的话，这游戏不会像现在这样火。
2.开发组为什么不用虚幻3做一个60帧的游戏，而要用虚幻4来伤害我们这些老爷机呢。
买不买还是仁者见仁智者见智，反正我b测就吃灰了。
